Text: Sometimes in some levels screen brighten up a lot when you are in first person mode. But when are  3rd person mode everything is normal. This is 1.2 bug. It's a problem with 'post filters level of detail' turning this off in graphic settings fixes it, but you also lose lighting effects.
Seems to be working fine. Thanx for the upload, keep it up
